modShortDescription: Books are rather scarce, especially in book piles. This mod greatly increases your chances of finding books in the world.
modDescription:
Books are rather scarce, especially in [book](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) piles. This mod greatly increases your chances of finding books in the world.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-megabooks)**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues).

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
